Metadata.Title: CVE-2024-7883 affecting package clang for versions less than 18.1.2-4
Metadata.Description: CVE-2024-7883 affecting package clang for versions less than 18.1.2-4. A patched version of the package is available.

Criterion.Comment: Package clang is earlier than 18.1.2-4, affected by CVE-2024-7883
